name: Bumpy Towers
description:
Bumpy Towers is an earthquake survival game. You must build a strong tower to survive the oncoming earthquake. Each round the earthquake gets stronger so you must build carefully to survive to the end.

CONTROLS

During Build Phase:

  • W,A,S,D to change where the block drops
  • [ , ] to rotate the camera
  • SPACE to drop a block
  • Q,E to change what block drops

During Earthquake:

  • W,A,S,D to tilt the building to keep it up
  • Earthquake lasts 30 seconds
